result.text:
The question "Why is it always a bengali?"

The answer is that the Bongs as a community peaked a bit early, Late 1800s to be precise, Science, Literature, Reform, Philosophy. The best in everything. Literally a Renaissance. Since then they have been bitter about all the lost glory & demand the same reverence. 

PS: There are some outliers ü•≤
